description.english: Extinguish a fire within 15 seconds after it has been caused by lightning strike

description.schinese: 在15秒内扑灭因闪电引发的火灾

description.english: Let your personnel slip a total of 100 times during blizzards

description.english: Use the sniper ability 10 times without injuring the target

description.english: Use the sniper ability 5 times and injure the target each time
